statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 67600. If she receives a raise of 3500 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-67600 = 32400. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{32400}}{{3500}}={9.2571428571429} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 10 years.
